data.feedback: Plan comprehensively covers all 5 user requirements (Dashboard, Sharing UI, Goals UI, Native Integration, Real-time Client). All filesToModify exist and are correctly identified. Plan follows existing Clean Architecture patterns verified in auth feature. Backend API routes align perfectly with planned frontend entities. Execution order is logical with proper dependencies. Only minor issue: pubspec.yaml path reference.
issues: Minor: story-dashboard-005 shows lib/pubspec.yaml but actual path is pubspec.yaml (at project root)
suggestions: Correct pubspec.yaml path reference in epic-dashboard
Consider adding error boundary widgets for graceful failure handling
